title: Spatial Visualization Types
description: An interactive guide showing six types of spatial visualizations (Geographic Map, Schematic Diagram, Floor Plan, Anatomical View, Network Topology, 3D Model) with guidance on when to use each type for effective communication.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Data Visualization
Instructional Design
Information Design
learningObjectives: Identify the six common types of spatial visualizations
Explain when to use each type of spatial visualization
Select the appropriate visualization type for a given scenario
Compare the strengths and limitations of different visualization types

controls.description: Hover over visualization type cards to see descriptions and examples

assumptions: Common classification of spatial visualization types used in education and technical communication
limitations: Does not cover all possible visualization types
